thread.title: BRIEF-Pepsico Says CEO Indra Nooyi's Total Compensation For 2017 Was $31.1 Mln V/s $29.8 Mln In 2016 ‍​

title: BRIEF-Pepsico Says CEO Indra Nooyi's Total Compensation For 2017 Was $31.1 Mln V/s $29.8 Mln In 2016 ‍​
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:30 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Pepsico Says CEO Indra Nooyi's Total Compensation For 2017 Was $31.1 Mln V/s $29.8 Mln In 2016 ‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Pepsico Inc: * PEPSICO SAYS CEO INDRA NOOYI’S TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $31.1 MILLION VERSUS $29.8 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING ‍​ * PEPSICO SAYS CFO HUGH JOHNSTON'S TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $11.7 MILLION VERSUS $10.3 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING ‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2FWoabT ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
